subject: Golf
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: The swing guru Hank Haney offers some surprises in a book about Tiger Woods that details their relationship from the first time they met, when Woods was 17, to when Haney quit in 2010.
snippet: The swing guru Hank Haney offers some surprises in a book about Tiger Woods that details their relationship from the first time they met, when Woods was 17, to when Haney quit in 2010.
